desc: Dainty NYC offers a wide range of women's clothing and shoes, as well as fashion accessories and delicate jewelry. Our pieces are sure to elicit comments, but are simple enough to accent, not dominate your outfit. Bags, Dresses, Intimates, Jackets, Jeans, Pants, Jumpsuits, Shorts, Skirts, Sweaters, Swim, Tops

layout.text: Use promo code DAINTY to receive 10% off your entire purchase
